questions.ans: Spot trading involves buying and selling assets for immediate delivery. It allows you to trade various financial instruments like stocks, forex, and cryptocurrencies at current market prices.

Futures trading involves buying and selling contracts that obligate the buyer to purchase, and the seller to sell, an asset at a predetermined future date and price. It allows for leverage and can be used for hedging or speculation.
You can trade a wide range of cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Litecoin, and many others. Our platform supports various crypto pairs for trading.

questions.que: Can I trade stocks on your platform?
questions.ans: Yes, our platform allows you to trade a variety of stocks from major global markets. You can access both spot and futures stock trading.

Automated trading, also known as trading bots, uses algorithms to execute trades based on predefined criteria. These bots can handle trades for you, ensuring that you donâ€™t miss out on opportunities due to market fluctuations.

questions.que: How secure is my trading data?
questions.ans: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your trading data. This includes encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits to ensure your information is safe.

questions.que: Are there any fees for trading?
questions.ans: Yes, our platform charges trading fees which vary based on the type of trade and asset. Detailed information on our fee structure is available on our website or can be obtained by contacting our support team.

questions.que: Can I use leverage for trading?
questions.ans: Yes, we offer leverage for both futures and margin trading. The amount of leverage available depends on the asset and market conditions. Always ensure you understand the risks associated with trading on margin.

questions.que: How can I get support if I have questions?
questions.ans: If you have any questions or need support, you can contact our customer service team via email, live chat, or phone. We are here to help you with any issues or queries you may have.
